ygData.subject: Re: Something...
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings once more. Well, I know of a high level ranger. Hitting 30 I think. He kills Ebons to Emeralds before. He didn t mention anything about faction. Or
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings once more.

Well, I know of a high level ranger. Hitting 30 I think. He kills Ebons to
Emeralds before. He didn't mention anything about faction. Or maybe he did
but I forgot.

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> I myself was hunting emerald drakes with a group of guys 2 weeks ago and
> one of them is a wood-elf cleric or something like tat. He refuse to
> attack emerald drakes coz he got a faction msg after he kill one. In the
> end we went for goblin camps instead.
